text:
Here you go, Fuyu-chan.
This is all of today's correspondence

We read through so many of them during the show
but honestly there wasn't near enough time for them all～
Fuyu-chan really is loved, aren't you!

The listeners' responses were also great. So much so that I'm
tempted to invite you as a guest again right away.

Fufu. I'm so happy.
Please do call me again soon♡
At that time, Asahi-chan and Mei-chan as well

The Straylight unit all together huh～!
That sounds great, that overwhelming feeling!
Well then, I'll be awaiting your invitation, okay?♡
